title: ching my acc yahoo
body: hi i need to ching my acc yahoo to this email from the old yahoo  -snip to new one is -snip- but i forget the pasword of old yahoo to geat the ip to ching the yahoo  so i ask to help me and thanks for help

replies.body: Hey I removed your info for privacy reasons.  Reach out to us in an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help with updating your info.
